meta.title: {componentName}
meta.categoryDescription: Overview over the {componentName} component. Learn more about its {category}.
meta.itemDescription: Overview over the {componentName} component. Learn more about the '{item}'-{category}.
meta.itemContentDescription:
Overview over the {componentName} component. Learn more about the '{item}'-{category}:
{content}

content.errorMessage: Shit happens! This site doesn't exist.
content.urlDisplay: You tried to access {path}.

label.description: Prop to set the label of the textfield. Will be used for the validation event. This should be set and a unique value. If the label slot is used the label prop will still be used for the validation event.

color.description:
Prop to set the colors of the textfield.
You can seperately set the background, text, hint, error, label, focused label, placeholder, icon, focused icon, border, focused border, error border and focused error border color.
If the outlined prop is set the background color will be transparent.
Keep in mind to keep the modifier classes for special states like they are in the default configuration and only alter the color classes.

rounded.description:
Prop to set the border radius of the textfield. This only applies on the textfield if the outlined prop is set.
The default value can be toggled by just setting the prop or disabled by setting it to 'false'.
To set a special value set it to a tailwind 'rounded'-class.

prependIcon.description:
Prop to toggle the slot that includes an icon in front of the textfield or handing a component via the prop.
The icon will be displayed inside the textfield and will be aligned to the left.

appendIcon.description:
Prop to toggle the slot that includes an icon at the end of the textfield or handing a component via the prop.
The icon will be displayed inside the textfield and will be aligned to the right.

disabled.description: Prop to set disable the textfield. When disabled the opacity will be set to 50% and the textfield won't be clickable anymore.

loading.description: Prop to set the loading state of the textfield. If applied the textfield will pulsate and a loading cursor will be displayed on hover.

outlined.description:
Prop to set the textfield to outlined. When set to true the border will be set to the default-value.
If provided with a tailwind 'border'-class the border-width can be set.
The background color will be transparent.

filled.description:
Prop to apply the filled style on the textfield. If set to true the border-class will be set to the default-value.
If provided with a tailwind 'border'-class the border-width can be set.
For the best appearance you should use a 'border-t'-class.

shadow.description: Prop to add a shadow to the textfield. The default value can be toggled by just setting the prop or disabled by setting it to 'false'. To set a special value set it to a tailwind 'shadow'-class.

transition.description:
Prop to set the transition settings of the textfield and the placeholder.
When set to 'true' the default transition will be applied.
When set to an object you can set the 'duration' and 'ease' seperately for the regular transitions and the transitions that apply on the placeholder.

placeholder.description: Prop to set the placeholder of the textfield.

hint.description: Prop to set the hint of the textfield.

type.description: Prop to set the type of the textfield.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the textfield. You can set it to a tailwind 'w'-class.

autocomplete.description: Prop to set the input's autocomplete value.

updateModelValue.description: Event that emits the value of the textfield on every input. This event is used to update v-model.

updateValidation.description: Event that emits the validation state of the textfield. This event can be used to check validation of the component in the parent.

focusIn.description: Event that will be emitted when the textfield got focused.

focusOut.description: Event that will be emitted when the textfield loses focus.

label.description: Slot to customize the default label of the textfield.

prependIcon.description: Slot to add an icon in front of the textfield. The icon will be displayed inside the textfield and will be aligned to the left. The 'prepend-icon' prop is required to apply the icon.

appendIcon.description: Slot to add an icon at the end of the textfield. The icon will be displayed inside the textfield and will be aligned to the right. The 'append-icon' prop is required to apply the icon.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

color.description:
Prop to set the color of the button.
You can seperately set the background, text, border and hover color.
If the 'outlined' prop is set, only the border and the text color will be used.
If the 'disabled' or 'loading' prop is set, the opacity will be set to 50% and the hover color will no longer take effect.
If the 'icon' prop is set, only the text & iconHover color will take effect.

rounded.description:
Prop to set the border radius of the button. The default value can be toggled by just setting the prop or disabled by setting it to 'false'.
To set a special value set it to a tailwind 'rounded'-class.

grow.description:
Prop to apply a grow effect to the button. The delay and scale can be set seperately.
To apply the effect on hover prefix the tailwind 'scale'-class with 'hover:'.

link.description: Prop to make the button a link. You either can set a complete link or a realtive url.

target.description: Prop to set the target of the link. Only applied when the 'link' prop is set.

disabled.description:
Prop to set the button to disabled. When disabled the opacity will be set to 50% and the hover color will no longer take effect.
The button won't be clickable anymore.
Also the grow effect no longer takes effect.

icon.description: Prop to set the button to an icon button. If set to true only the text and hover color will take effect.

loading.description:
Prop to set the button to loading. When loading the opacity will be set to 50% and the hover color will no longer take effect.
The button won't be clickable anymore.
Also the grow effect no longer takes effect. A loading spinner will be displayed instead of the button content.

outlined.description:
Prop to set the button to outlined. When set to true the border will be set to the default-value.
If provided with a tailwind 'border'-class the border-width can be set.
The background color will be transparent.
Also the hover color will no longer take effect. Instead the border and text color will be applied.

shadow.description: Prop to add a shadow to the button. The default value can be toggled by just setting the prop or disabled by setting it to 'false'. To set a special value set it to a tailwind 'shadow'-class.

transition.description:
Prop to set the transition settings of the button, that will take effect on hover-color-change and the grow prop.
When set to 'false' no transition will be applied.
When set to 'true' the default transition will be applied.
When set to an object you can set the 'duration' and 'timing-function' seperately.

dense.description: Prop to set the button to dense. When set to true the padding will be reduced and the text will be set to small.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the button. You can set it to a tailwind 'w'-class.

height.description: Prop to set the height of the button. You can set it to a tailwind 'h'-class.

default.description: Slot to set the content of the button.

progress.description: The button component requires the Progress Component.
progress.title: Progress component

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

size.description: Only applies on linear progress variant. Prop to set the dimensions of the component.

color.description:
Prop to set the colors of the component. For the linear variant following colors can be set seperately: background, first animation strike, second animation strike, progress color and hover progress.
For the circular variant the following: circle itself, progress color and the inner cutout color.

circular.description:
Prop to set the component to the circular variant. The circular variant can be customized by setting it to an object with the following properties:
width: Can be set to any Tailwind 'w'-class.
height: Can be set to any Tailwind 'h'-class.
cutout.width: Can be set to any Tailwind 'w'-class combined with the 'before'-modifier.
cutout.height: Can be set to any Tailwind 'h'-class combined with the 'before'-modifier.
cutout.text: Can be set to any Tailwind 'text'-class to set the text size of the component.

loading.description: Prop to set the loading state of the component.

initialLoadTime.description:
This prop behaves differently depending on the chosen variant.
Linear: The time in ms between creation of the component and actual displaying the progress. For the best effect make sure the transition prop is active.
Circular: The time in ms that the component takes to progress to the given value.

rounded.description: Applies on the linear variant. Prop to set the border-radius of the component. Can be disabled by setting it to 'false' or customized by setting the prop to a Tailwind 'rounded'-class.

initialLoadTimeType.description:
Prop to set the way how the speed of the growth of the circular progress will be interpreted.
Valid options are:
calc: The speed will be calculated for every growth individually, making each growth the same speed.
static: The speed will be set to the given value. Every single step will take the same time.

innerCircle.description: Slot to customize the inner circle area on the circular variant.

linearAnimation.name: Linear loading animation
linearAnimation.description: For the linear loading animation to work properly its required to extend the tailwind config by the shown options.

resolveConfig.title: Resolve Tailwind-colors to hex-colors
resolveConfig.description: Since the component requires hex-colors for additional custom CSS you can easily resolve the hex-color from a tailwind color by using this method.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

rounded.description: Only applies on the linear variant.

rule.maxVal: The value must be less or equal to {max}
rule.isNumber: This value must be a number

id.description: Prop to set the id of the notification. Required and must be unique.

autoClose.description: Prop to activate or deactivate automatic closing of the notification after given duration.

color.description: Prop to set the colors of the toast. You can separatly set the text, background color for the base toast and for each toast type individually.

duration.description: Duration the toast will be displayed. Applies when 'autoClose' is set to 'true'.

rounded.description: Prop to set the border-radius of the toast. Can either be toggled with a Boolean-Value or specified by handing any Tailwind 'rounded'-class.

type.description: Setting the toast's type. Can be one of the following: info, warning, error, success.

title.description: Prop to set the toast's title.

message.description: Prop to set the toast's message.

shadow.description: Prop to set the toast's shadow. Can be set to any Tailwind 'shadow'-class.

width.description: Prop to set the toast's width. Can be set to any Tailwind "w"-class.

icon.title: Unplugin Icons Package
icon.description: The icon on the toast will change accordingly to the set type. The icons that are displayed are taken from the Unplugin-Icons-Package.

button.title: Button Component
button.description: The toast component requires the Button Component.

progress.title: Progress Component
progress.description: The toast component requires the Progress Component. It'll be used for displaying the timeline when the autoClose prop is enabled.

close.description: Event that gets emitted when the toast closes. Either by clicking the 'x' or after the autoClose timer.

autoClose.description: Event that gets emitted when the toast closes due to an autoClose timer.

textfield.description: This prop only applies on the integrated textfield component. Read more about its behavior.

items.description: Prop to fill the select component's items.

color.description: Prop to set the color for the background, text, border and hover color of the drop down that appears when clicking the select field. With a nested 'textfield'-Object the colors of the textfield itself can be set. More information on the textfield color prop.

search.description: Prop to lower the drop down of the select field and show a search field to filter the select's items.

disabled.description: Prop to disable the select field. The dropdown will no longer appear when this prop is set. Also the effects of the 'disabled'-prop of the textfield will apply.

loading.description: Prop to set the loading-state of the select field. The dropdown will no longer appear when this prop is set. Also the effects of the 'loading'-prop of the textfield will apply.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the select drop down. The width of the textfield can also be set.

height.description: Prop to set the height of the select drop down.

textfield.description: This slot just redirects to the identically named slot of the 'textfield'-component. More information about it.

textfield.title: Textfield-Component
textfield.description: The select component requires the textfield Component.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

color.description: Prop to set the color of the following parts of the chechbox component: label, description, iconInactiive, iconActive and hover.

label.description: Prop to set the label text of the checkbox.

description.description: Prop to set the description of the checkbox.

text.description: Prop to change the text appearance of the label and the description.

loading.description: Prop to set the loading state of the checkbox.

radio.description: Prop that changes the icons to round ones.

label.description: Slot to change the standard appearance of the checkbox's label.

description.description: Slot to change the standard appearance of the checkbox's description.

icon.title: Unplugin Icons Package
icon.description: The icon of the checkbox changes according to its value. The icons that are displayed are taken from the Unplugin-Icons-Package.

group.title: Checkbox Groups
group.description: For better handling of groups of checkboxes have a look at the 'Checkboxgroup'-Component.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

color.description: Prop to set the color of the label and the description of the checkboxgroup individually.

text.description: Prop to change the appearance of the label and the description of the checkboxgroup component.

label.description: Prop to set the checkboxgroup's title.

description.description: Prop to set the checkboxgroup's description.

items.description: Prop to set the items of the group. The items must be objects that include valid props for the checkbox-component. Read more about it.

multiple.description: Prop to allow multiple checkboxes to be selected at once. If not set the group will only allow one checked box at a time. Also the icons will be changed to rounded ones. This can be changed by setting the 'no-radio'-prop.

loading.description: Prop to set the loading state of the component.

width.description: Prop to change the checkboxgroup's width.

generalCheckboxProps.description: Prop to easily set same props for multiple checkboxes. Read more about possible props.

notZero.description: Prop to make sure that at least one checkbox is checked.

checkbox.title: Checkbox component
checkbox.description: The checkboxgroup component requires the Checkbox Component.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

label.description: Prop to set the label of the textarea. Will be used for the validation event. This should be set and a unique value. If the label slot is used the label prop will still be used for the validation event.

color.description:
Prop to set the colors of the textarea.
You can seperately set the background, text, hint, error, label, focused label, placeholder, icon, focused icon, border, focused border, error border and focused error border color.
If the outlined prop is set the background color will be transparent.
Keep in mind to keep the modifier classes for special states like they are in the default configuration and only alter the color classes.

rounded.description:
Prop to set the border radius of the textarea. This only applies on the textarea if the outlined prop is set.
The default value can be toggled by just setting the prop or disabled by setting it to 'false'.
To set a special value set it to a tailwind 'rounded'-class.

prependIcon.description:
Prop to toggle the slot that includes an icon in front of the textarea or handing a component via the prop.
The icon will be displayed inside the textarea and will be aligned to the left.

appendIcon.description:
Prop to toggle the slot that includes an icon at the end of the textarea or handing a component via the prop.
The icon will be displayed inside the textarea and will be aligned to the right.

disabled.description: Prop to disable the textarea. When disabled the opacity will be set to 50% and the textarea won't be clickable anymore.

loading.description: Prop to set the loading state of the textarea. If applied the textarea will pulsate and a loading cursor will be displayed on hover.

outlined.description:
Prop to set the textarea to outlined. When set to true the border will be set to the default-value.
If provided with a tailwind 'border'-class the border-width can be set.
The background color will be transparent.

filled.description:
Prop to apply the filled style on the textarea. If set to true the border-class will be set to the default-value.
If provided with a tailwind 'border'-class the border-width can be set.
For the best appearance you should use a 'border-t'-class.

shadow.description: Prop to add a shadow to the textarea. The default value can be toggled by just setting the prop or disabled by setting it to 'false'. To set a special value set it to a tailwind 'shadow'-class.

transition.description:
Prop to set the transition settings of the textarea and the placeholder.
When set to 'true' the default transition will be applied.
When set to an object you can set the 'duration' and 'ease' seperately for the regular transitions and the transitions that apply on the placeholder.

placeholder.description: Prop to set the placeholder of the textarea.

hint.description: Prop to set the hint of the textarea.

height.description: Prop to set the height of the textarea. You can set it to a tailwind 'h'-class.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the textarea. You can set it to a tailwind 'w'-class.

autocomplete.description: Prop to set the textarea's autocomplete value.

counter.description: Prop to show a counter in the top right corner of the textarea, that counts the input characters.

updateModelValue.description: Event that emits the value of the textarea on every input. This event is used to update v-model.

updateValidation.description: Event that emits the validation state of the textarea. This event can be used to check validation of the component in the parent.

focusIn.description: Event that will be emitted when the textarea got focused.

focusOut.description: Event that will be emitted when the textarea loses focus.

label.description: Slot to customize the default label of the textarea.

prependIcon.description: Slot to add an icon in front of the textarea. The icon will be displayed inside the textarea and will be aligned to the left. The 'prepend-icon' prop is required to apply the icon.

appendIcon.description: Slot to add an icon at the end of the textarea. The icon will be displayed inside the textarea and will be aligned to the right. The 'append-icon' prop is required to apply the icon.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

color.description: Prop to set the appbar's color.

fixed.description: Prop to set the appbar's position to 'fixed'.

absolute.description: Prop to set the appbar's position to 'absolute'.

sticky.description: Prop to set the appbar's position to 'sticky'.

bottom.description: Prop to change the appbar's position to the bottom. Requires position 'absolute' or 'fixed'.

extension.description: Prop to activate the extension-slot providing extra space below the appbar.

shrinkOnScroll.description: Prop to shrink the extension slot on scroll.

elevateOnScroll.description: Prop to add a drop shadow to the appbar on scroll.

navigationIcon.description: Prop to activate the navigation-icon-slot. It's also possible to provide a component to the prop. The default icon is MDI-Menu.

scrollOffset.description: Prop to set the Y-Scroll-Offset if the appbar is used in a relative overflow parent element.

height.description: Prop to set the appbar's height.

zIndex.description: Prop to set the appbar's z-index.

navigationIconClick.description: Event that will be emitted when the default navigation-icon is clicked.

navigationIcon.description: Slot to provide a custom navigation-icon.

icon.description: The default navigation-icon is taken from the Unplugin-Icons-Packet.
icon.title: Unplugins Icon Packet

button.title: Button component
button.description: The appbar requires the Button-Component.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

color.description: Prop to set the drawer and overlay color.

absolute.description: Prop to set the position of the drawer to 'absolute'.

fixed.description: Prop to set the position of the drawer to 'fixed'.

zIndex.description: Prop to set the Z-Index of the Drawer.

overlay.description: Prop to enable or disable the overlay.

disableOverflow.description: Prop to disable or enable the Page-Overflow when the drawer is opened.

expandOnHover.description: Prop to expand the drawer on hover.

transition.description: Prop to set the transition settings of the drawer. The duration and ease can be set separately.

noMobile.description: Prop to prevent the drawer from disabling the expand-on-hover prop when using a mobile device.

mobileWidth.description: Prop to set the threshhold when the noMobile-Prop should take effect.

border.description: Prop to set the border settings of the drawer. If the 'right'-prop is set this prop must be altered accordingly.

right.description: Prop to place the drawer on the right side.

height.description: Prop to set the height of the drawer.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the drawer.

permanent.description: Prop to disable closing the drawer on clicking outside.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

playground.tooltip: This is a tooltip telling you not to click the button! :)

toast.message: You´re supposed to hover over me and not click!

color.description: Prop to set the color of the tooltip. The color of the text, tooltip background and the pointer background can be set separately.

top.description: Prop to position the tooltip above the content.

bottom.description: Prop to position the tooltip below the content.

left.description: Prop to position the tooltip left of the content.

right.description: Prop to position the tooltip right of the content.

transition.description: Prop to set the duration and ease of the opacity-transition.

text.description: Prop to set the default text appearance.

rounded.description: Prop to set or disable the tooltip's border radius.

zIndex.description: Prop to set the z-index of the tooltip.

width.description: Prop to set the tooltip's width.

interactive.description: Prop to make the tooltip interactive.

tooltip.description: Slot to insert the tooltip's content.

checkboxgroup.label: Bool-Prop Selection
checkboxgroup.description: By checking or unchecking the boxes the props will be handled accordingly.

checkbox.label: Icon (Exclamation-Mark)
checkbox.description: Displays an icon instead of the text above.

color.description: Prop to set the colors of the badge. The background, border and text color can be set separately.

top.description: Prop to position the badge at the top of its sibling.

bottom.description: Prop to position the badge at the bottom of its sibling.

left.description: Prop to position the badge at the left of its sibling.

right.description: Prop to position the badge at the right of its sibling.

text.description: Prop to set the text settings of the badge content.

border.description: Prop to set the border of the badge. It can also be disabled by setting this prop to false.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the badge.

height.description: Prop to set the height of the badge.

textfield.default: Slot for the sibling component on which the badge will be applied.

color.description: Prop to set the slider's colors. The description-text, slider-line and slider-thumb can be set separately.

label.description: Prop to set the label of the slider. It can also be fully customized by using the equally named slot.

description.description: Prop to set the description of the slider. It can also be fully customized by using the equally named slot.

min.description: Prop to set the minimum value of the slider range.

max.description: Prop to set the maximum value of the slider range.

thumbSize.description: Prop to set the size of the slider-thumb in px.

rounded.description: Prop to either disable the rounded prop of the slider by setting it to false or customizing it by providing a Tailwind-'rounded'-class.

width.description: Prop to set the width of the slider.

height.description: Prop to set the height of the slider.

resolveConfig.title: Resolve Tailwind-colors to hex-colors
resolveConfig.description: Since the component requires hex-colors for additional custom CSS you can easily resolve the hex-color from a tailwind color by using this method.

autoplay.description: Prop to enable or disable auto playing the carousel.

timeout.description: Prop to set the timeout per carousel-item.

disableAutoPlayOnHover.description: Prop to pause auto-play when hovering over the carousel.

hideNavigation.description: Prop to hide the navigation on both sides.

hidePagination.description: Prop to hide the the pagination.

shadow.description: Prop to add a shadow to the carousel. Can be disabled by setting it to 'false' or customized by providing a tailwind-'shadow'-class.

transition.description: Prop to add or customize the transitions on the Carousel.

default.description: Default Slot that must be filled with one or more "CarouselItem"-elements in which custom content can be added. The CarouselItem must have the step prop set to a number. CarouselItems must be direct childs of Carousel!
